title.rendered: Certification Ceremony Held for 40 Students Completing Advanced C# Programming with SQL Databases in Prishtina and Mitrovica

content.rendered:
We just wrapped up the certification ceremonies for 40 students, in Prishtina and Mitrovica, who successfully completed the advanced training module in “C# Programming with SQL Databases”!
 
These past months have been filled with learning, challenges, and dedication from our two groups of students in Prishtina and Mitrovica. Today, we proudly handed out certificates to everyone who showed hard work and passion for technology!
 
Congratulations to all the certified participants! This is just the beginning of a successful journey in the world of programming.
We are proud of you and can’t wait to see what you will achieve in the future!
